IncidentDef.label: toxic fallout
IncidentDef.letterText:
A distant chemical fire has released a plume of poison over this entire region.

Any person or creature not under a roof will be slowly sickened by the toxic dust settling out of the atmosphere.

It will last for anywhere between a few days to over a month.

IncidentDef.label: volcanic winter
IncidentDef.letterText: A distant supervolcano has erupted and begun spewing millions of cubic kilometers of ash into the atmosphere.\n\nAsh in the atmosphere will obscure the sun. Temperatures will drop and plants will suffer for lack of sunlight. It could pass in a few weeks, or it might last many months.
